subSubSection.paragraph: cf. Oneirophanta morphospecies In the "Atlas of Abyssal Megafauna Morphotypes of the Clarion-Clipperton Fracture Zone" created for the ISA (http://ccfzatlas.com/), this morphospecies is listed as " Oneirophanta setigera Ludwig, 1893".
